Class TiWiFi

extends Object
    The TiWiFi for platform of framework.
    Author:
    Andy.

    • Method Detail

      • changePassword

        public void changePassword(String password)
                    throws IOException
        Change the WiFi password, effective at next startup
        Parameters:
        password - password string of AP, or "" no password
        Throws:
        IOException - If a TiWiFi error occurs
        NullPointerException - If password is null

      • changeSoftAPPassword

        public void changeSoftAPPassword(String password)
                          throws IOException
        Change the WiFi softAP password, effective at next startup
        Parameters:
        password - password string of AP, or null
        Throws:
        IOException - If a TiWiFi error occurs
        NullPointerException - If password is null

        NullPointerException - If SSID is null

      • getSoftAPStaticAddress

        public String[] getSoftAPStaticAddress()
                                throws IOException
        Gets the WiFi softAP static address
        Returns:
        static address or """"
        address[0] local address, for example:1.local, "192.168.1.100"
        address[1] gateWay address/subnet prefix length, for example:1.gateWay, "192.168.1.1/24"
        Throws:
        IOException - If a TiWiFi error occurs

      • getSoftAPStationNum

        public int getSoftAPStationNum()
                        throws IOException
        Gets the number of station on the softAP of WiFi
        Returns:
        number
        Throws:
        IOException - If a TiWiFi error occurs

      • getSSID

        public String getSSID()
               throws IOException
        Gets the WiFi SSID
        Returns:
        SSID string or null
        Throws:
        IOException - If a TiWiFi error occurs

      • getStaticAddress

        public String[] getStaticAddress()
                          throws IOException
        Gets the WiFi static address
        Returns:
        static address or """"
        address[0] local address, for example:1.local, "192.168.1.100"
        address[1] gateWay address/subnet prefix length, for example:1.gateWay, "192.168.1.1/24"
        Throws:
        IOException - If a TiWiFi error occurs

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
                    throws IOException
        Check if WiFi is connected
        Returns:
        true or false
        Throws:
        IOException - If a TiWiFi error occurs

      • setSoftAPStaticAddress

        public void setSoftAPStaticAddress(String localAddress,
                                   String gateWayAddress,
                                   int subnetPrefix)
                            throws IOException
        Set the WiFi softAP static address, effective at next startup
        Parameters:
        localAddress - local address
        For example:1.local, "192.168.1.100"
        2."", static address off
        gateWayAddress - gateWay address
        For example:1.gateWay, "192.168.1.1"
        2."", static address off
        subnetPrefix - the subnet prefix length
        For example(IPv4):"255.255.255.0" subnet prefix 24
        Throws:
        IOException - If a TiWiFi error occurs
        NullPointerException - If localAddress or gateWayAddress is null

      • setStaticAddress

        public void setStaticAddress(String localAddress,
                             String gateWayAddress,
                             int subnetPrefix)
                      throws IOException
        Set the WiFi static address, effective at next startup
        Parameters:
        localAddress - local address
        For example:1.local, "192.168.1.100"
        2."", static address off
        gateWayAddress - gateWay address
        For example:1.gateWay, "192.168.1.1"
        2."", static address off
        subnetPrefix - the subnet prefix length
        For example(IPv4):"255.255.255.0" subnet prefix 24
        Throws:
        IOException - If a TiWiFi error occurs
        NullPointerException - If localAddress or gateWayAddress is null

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
              throws IOException
        Shutdown the WiFi, WiFi and WiFiSoftAP are shutdown at the same time
        Throws:
        IOException - If a TiWiFi error occurs

      • shutdownSoftAP

        public void shutdownSoftAP()
                    throws IOException
        Shutdown the softAP of WiFi
        Throws:
        IOException - If a TiWiFi error occurs

      • smartConfig

        public void smartConfig(int timeout)
                 throws IOException
        The WiFi smart configuration, and connect to the AP
        Parameters:
        timeout - connect timeout, unit:second
        Throws:
        IOException - If a TiWiFi error occurs

      • startup

        public void startup(int timeout)
             throws IOException
        Startup the WiFi, and connect to the AP
        Parameters:
        timeout - connect timeout, unit:second
        Throws:
        IOException - If a TiWiFi error occurs

      • startupSoftAP

        public void startupSoftAP(boolean hidden)
                   throws IOException
        Startup the softAP of WiFi, WiFi must startup first
        Parameters:
        hidden - true:SSID hidden, false:SSID not hidden[IN]
        Throws:
        IOException - If a TiWiFi error occurs
